items.name: Adaptive Implant
items.desc:
Mod: While above 50% health, gain 30% attack damage and 30 ability power. While below, gain 30% omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 60%

items.name: Virulent Bioware
items.desc:
Mod: Release a virulent plague whenever you deal Ability damage, causing enemies within 1 hex of the target to take 20% more damage for 4 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration is 10 seconds and plague deals 5% max health magic damage per second.

items.name: Hextech Exoskeleton
items.desc:
Mod: Gain 30 armor and magic resistance. Every 5 seconds, cleanse all negative effects and heal for 12% of your max health.

Overcharge: Each time the wearer heals, deal 150% of the heal amount as damage to all nearby enemies.

items.name: Shimmer Injector
items.desc:
Mod: Gain 25% attack speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 heath, increase the attack speed by 100% and heal for 35% of your max health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the attack speed 400% and heal 100% of your max health.

items.name: Robotic Arm
items.desc:
Mod: Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attacks.

Overcharge: Attack deal 50% Attack Damage as bonus true damage.

items.name: Unstable Chemtank
items.desc:
Mod: Gain 33% bonus max health and explode on death, dealing 35% of your maximum health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Overcharge: Explosion gets larger and damage increases to 45% of your maximum health.

items.name: Self Repair
items.desc:
When the Apex Turret would die, it instead becomes untargetable and 7 seconds repairs itself if Heimerdinger is still alive.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase Apex Turret bonus Armor and Magic Resist
items.shortDesc:
1 Count: 10 Armor and Magic Resist
2 Count: 50 Armor and Magic Resist
3 Count: 100 Armor and Magic Resist
items.fromDesc:
1 Count: 10 Armor and Magic Resist
2 Count: 50 Armor and Magic Resist
3 Count: 100 Armor and Magic Resist

items.name: Mechano-Swarm
items.desc:
Permanently upgrades the Apex Turret to fire rockets in a wide cone every 3 attacks. Each rocket deals magic damage and applies Burn and Wounds.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the magic damage and Burn amount.
items.shortDesc:
1 Count: 50 magic damage, 1% Burn
2 Count: 80 magic damage, 2% Burn
3 Count: 120 magic damage, 3% Burn
items.fromDesc:
Wounds: 33%, Burn and Wounds Duration: 10sec
1 Count: 50 magic damage, 1% Burn 2 Count: 80 magic damage, 2% Burn 3 Count: 120 magic damage, 3% Burn

items.name: Shrink Module
items.desc:
Permanently upgrades the Apex Turret to shrink all enemies it damages, Shredding and Sundering them.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the Shred and Sunder.

Sunder: reduce Armor
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
items.shortDesc:
1 Copy: 40% Shred and Sunder
2 Copy: 50% Shred and Sunder
3 Copy: 70% Shred and Sunder
items.fromDesc:
1 Copy: 40% Shred and Sunder
2 Copy: 50% Shred and Sunder
3 Copy: 70% Shred and Sunder

items.name: Goldinator
items.desc:
Permanently upgrades the Apex Turret's damage to excute enemies under 12% Health. Exectuions have a 100% chance to turn enemies into gold.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the amount of gold dropped.
items.shortDesc:
1 Count: 1 gold
2 Count: 2 gold
3 Count: 4 gold
items.fromDesc:
1 Count: 1 gold
2 Count: 2 gold
3 Count: 4 gold

items.name: Needlessly Big Gem
items.desc: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant 1 gold per 2 living allies, and each living ally deals 1% more damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).

items.name: Draven's Axe
items.desc: Gain 1% Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 9 gold.

items.name: Gambler's Blade
items.desc: Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

items.name: Diamond Hands
items.desc: Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 2 gold.

items.name: Crown of Demacia
items.desc: If the wearer starts combat in the front 2 rows, regenerate 2-7% maximum Health per second (based on stage). If they start in the back 2 rows, gain 1-7% AD and AP every second instead. If the wearer of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.You can remove this item by benching the wearer.

items.name: TheDarkinBlade
items.desc: If the holder of this item gets a takedown, they will be consumed and Aatrox will be reborn!

items.name: Mogul's Mail
items.desc: Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 6 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

items.name: Goldmancer's Staff
items.desc: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold) and a 40% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

items.name: Determined Investor
items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 5 gold.

items.name: Scroll of knowledge
items.desc: Use on a unit to open a special armory that offers every available emblem that matches that unit's inherent traits.

items.name: Master work upgrade
items.desc: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.
